thread.title: nexTUNE Introduces Mobile Web App for Businesses to Play Licensed Music
thread.title_full: nexTUNE Introduces Mobile Web App for Businesses to Play Licensed Music - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: nexTUNE Introduces Mobile Web App for Businesses to Play Licensed Music
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE nexTUNE
nexTUNE offers a simple and inexpensive solution for businesses to use their mobile device to play licensed streaming music.
REDMOND, Wash. , Oct. 26, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- nexTUNE offers a simple and inexpensive solution for business establishments to use their mobile device to play licensed streaming music. At a cost of $15.95 per month, small businesses now have an inexpensive alternative to other similar services that charge as much as $34.95 .
Logo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151026/NY38022LOGO
Business owners have had to purchase expensive proprietary playback devices in order to play licensed music in their establishments. Now, any business can use their iOS or Android smart phone, or tablet, to play an extensive variety of music channels designed for specific business environments.
Business owners can sign up from the mobile app, monitor their account and select any one of the 110 music channels offered through the mobile app. To access the nexTUNE Mobile App go to http://www.nexTUNE.com or from a mobile device go to http://nexTUNEapp.com .
About nexTUNE
nexTUNE is "The Premier Background Music Source" for retail, hospitality and lifestyle consumer environments. nexTUNE creates emotional connections between businesses and their customer that results in longer stay times, increased purchases and more frequent visits. nexTUNE provides a licensed music service to businesses throughout the United States , its territories and Canada .
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/nextune-introduces-mobile-web-app-for-businesses-to-play-licensed-music-300165991.html
